title: i had no good wifi and i have a leaverbuster
body:
i had no good wifi because i was not in the room where the best wifi was.
i go to the game, i was ready to do another game but i had a leaverbuster. 
now i must wait 20 minutes because i had no wifi, what can i now do? please say it to me
{{champion:32}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately leaverbuster penalties will not and cannot be removed under any circumstance.

It is **YOUR** responsibility to ensure your connection is stable and that you're able to dedicate enough time to complete the match **BEFORE** you enter queue.

Read more about the leaverbuster system [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).
